page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: There are 110 children in our school. We surveyed 25 children aged 9-11 to discover the types of games that are played. In our area there are no sports centres public swimning pools but 75% of the children travel to either Hastings or Eastbourne to use the facilities available there. Games mentioned by the children include:Netball, Football, Cricket, Stoolball, Rounders, Hockey and Bowls. Indoor games include snooker, billiads, many board games ,darts and cards. The facilities far out door games is limited. There is only one public football pitch, and no public tennis court.Playground games include Hop-scotch Skipping Conkers Football Ring-A-Roses Marbles and Races.The school has a small swimming pool, large field and a large playground.
